original_text: And I heard a great voice out of heaven saying, Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God.
korean_text: 내가 들으니 보좌에서 큰 음성이 나서 이르되 보라 하나님의 장막이 사람들과 함께 있으매 하나님이 그들과 함께 계시리니 그들은 하나님의 백성이 되고 하나님은 친히 그들과 함께 계셔서

sentences.original_text: And I heard a great voice out of heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 하늘로부터 큰 음성을 들었으니

sentences.original_text: the tabernacle of God is with men
and he will dwell with them
and they shall be his people
and God himself shall be with them
